params.sqlcmd: "INSERT INTO " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT(OUTPUT_RSLT_CD, ITEM_CD, WS_CD, ACPT_QTY, DEFECT_QTY, DEFECT_CAUSE_CD, DEFECT_COMMENT, OPR_DATE, WH_CD, OUTPUT_RSLT_PERSON, OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP, OPR_TIME, PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, CESSATION_TIME, CESSATION_CAUSE, OUTPUT_RSLT_COMMENT, PLANT_CD, LOT_NO, VEND_LOT_NO) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, 0, 0, '0', NULL, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL, NULL, ?, NULL, NULL)"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_OPR_RSLT(OPR_INST_CD, PARTIAL_PRD_NO, ITEM_CD, WS_CD, ACPT_QTY, DEFECT_QTY, OPR_DATE, WH_CD, OPR_RSLT_PERSON, OPR_RSLT_COMMENT, OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP, PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, OPR_TIME, CESSATION_TIME, CESSATION_CAUSE, OUTPUT_RSLT_CD, PLANT_CD, LOT_NO, VEND_LOT_NO, OPR_CRCT_NO) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, 0, 0, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, NULL, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL, ?, ?, NULL, NULL, 0)"

"SELECT " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD, " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD, " +" M_WS.WS_NAME, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE) AS OPR_INST_START_DATE, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE) AS WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_QTY, " +" T_OD.TOTAL_RCV_QTY, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" T_OD.OD_NO, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.MODIFY_COUNT, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_CD " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WS, " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD = M_WS.WS_CD(+) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_RSLT_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_STS_TYP = 2 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1 " +"ORDER BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD"
